title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description:
Detailed documentation of the AI Tactical Advisor system requirements:
	* Data inputs: sensor data, intelligence reports, terrain maps, weather conditions, etc.
	* Expected outputs: tactical recommendations, risk assessments, resource allocation plans, situational awareness reports
	* Performance criteria: real-time response (< 1 second latency), accuracy (over 90% for tactical recommendations, 85% for risk assessments and resource allocation plans), scalability to support up to 100 concurrent connections, adaptability to dynamic battlefield conditions, reliability under stress (99.9% uptime)
	* Integration with existing military systems: command and control systems, communication networks, logistics management systems, drone control systems
	* Security considerations: data privacy (compliance with GDPR or equivalent standards), cybersecurity measures (encryption, secure communication channels), threat modeling, access controls, incident response plan, vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, security audits
	* Documentation of software architecture, APIs, UI/UX design, and database structure (if applicable)
	* Performance testing and benchmarking to ensure the system meets the defined criteria
	* Project milestones: initial prototype completion, integration with military systems, user acceptance testing (UAT), deployment
	* Additional considerations for this task:
		- Clearly define the AI models and algorithms to be used for data analysis and prediction.
		- Include a section on system monitoring and logging for troubleshooting purposes.
		- Consider edge computing or decentralized solutions for real-time data processing, if applicable.
   		- Add emphasis on the need for the system to handle high-stress environments (e.g., battlefield situations) and the implications of system downtime.
		- Provide a clear roadmap for the development process, including key deliverables and timelines.

   If the RFC is ready for approval, please update the 'rfc_state' field to 'READY_FOR_APPROVAL'.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture for the AI Tactical Advisor system, including components for data ingestion, processing, analysis, and decision-making.

title: Implement Data Ingestion and Processing
description: Build components for ingesting and preprocessing battlefield data from various sources, such as sensors, intelligence reports, and geospatial data.

title: Develop AI Decision-Making Engine
description: Implement the core AI algorithms and models for analyzing battlefield data and generating tactical recommendations.

title: Build User Interface and Visualization
description: Create a user interface and data visualization components for presenting tactical recommendations and battlefield data to military commanders.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop security measures and access controls to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of sensitive battlefield data and tactical recommendations.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish a comprehensive testing and quality assurance process to validate the accuracy and reliability of the AI Tactical Advisor system.

title: Plan Deployment and Integration
description: Develop a deployment strategy and integration plan for the AI Tactical Advisor system, including infrastructure provisioning, data migration, and integration with existing military systems.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for the AI Tactical Advisor system, covering installation, configuration, usage, and maintenance.
